price: Basi watavurumizwa humo wao na hao wakosefu,
footnotes: Watatumbukizwa katika Jahannamu kifudifudi, wakipinduliwa pinduliwa mpaka waishie ndani kabisa shimoni, wao na walio wapoteza na wakawatia katika madhambi na upotovu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
